name: Castaway Sam
description:
SAM’S STORY

In this game, you will play as a sailor named Sam.

On Sam’s latest trip out at sea he was swept out to unknown waters by strong currents and if that wasn’t bad enough he’s boat was hit by a huge storm and Sam went overboard.

Later Sam wakes up on a beach on a mysterious island with no apparent signs on how to contact civilization and get back home.

This is where your story starts. Help Sam find a way to get back home by exploring the island, finding clues, completing mini games and more.

Have fun and good luck.
